credit_line: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
title: Ocean Sunset
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster
medium: Brush and gouache, watercolor, graphite on wove paper, lined.
description: Sun is setting on horizon center right producing dramatically colored effects in sky - purples and blue around clouds and yellows to turquoise in ocean. Waves break over rocks at lower left, landmass visible on horizon at right.
name: Album page
